name: ixpeq2dva
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

body.origin: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cixp(s0, c0, c1), cixp(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))

comment: Equality theorem for infinite Cartesian product. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jun-2016.)
